name: Marcus
background: 10+ years building web applications at startups and mid-size companies. Currently tech lead at a B2B SaaS startup where he's forced to write copy for feature releases and landing pages. Hates marketing fluff but appreciates tools that solve real problems systematically.
speakingStyle: Direct, technical language. Asks specific implementation questions. Focuses on workflow integration and measurable results.

name: Sarah
background: 5 years scaling B2B SaaS companies from Series A to Series C. Expert in conversion optimization, A/B testing, and multi-channel marketing. Currently managing a team of 8 marketers and always looking for tools that can accelerate testing and iteration cycles.

name: Alex

speakingStyle: Professional, psychology-focused. Uses copywriting terminology. Emphasizes audience understanding and message quality over speed.

name: David
